hero.subtitle: Fullstack Developer
hero.description: Focused on building clean, accessible, and high-performance web experiences. Attention to code quality, architecture, and the details that shape great user experiences.

about.intro: I'm Ignacio Figueroa, a web developer focused on fullstack development with a strong passion for continuous learning.
about.journey: I discovered programming in 2022, shortly before finishing high school. Since then, I've immersed myself in modern web development, learning independently about technologies, best practices, and interface design.
about.education: I'm currently studying Programming at UTN, combining formal education with my self-taught journey to strengthen my foundation and keep growing professionally.
about.project: This project was born as a way to document my journey, share knowledge, and build my own space on the web as I continue developing as a professional.

contact.title: Let's connect
contact.description: Reach out to me via email or on social media
